description: Grants temporary access to MongoDB employees for a specific cluster. This allows MongoDB support engineers to access cluster infrastructure, database logs, or app services sync data for troubleshooting purposes.

Profile.description: Profile used to provide credentials information, (a secret with the cfn/atlas/profile/{Profile}, is required), if not provided default is used

ProjectId.description:
Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project. Use the [/groups](#tag/Projects/operation/listProjects) endpoint to retrieve all projects to which the authenticated user has access.

**NOTE**: Groups and projects are synonymous terms. Your group id is the same as your project id. For existing groups, your group/project id remains the same. The resource and corresponding endpoints use the term groups.

ClusterName.description: Human-readable label that identifies this cluster.

GrantType.description: Level of access to grant to MongoDB Employees. Possible values are CLUSTER_DATABASE_LOGS, CLUSTER_INFRASTRUCTURE or CLUSTER_INFRASTRUCTURE_AND_APP_SERVICES_SYNC_DATA.

ExpirationTime.description: Expiration date for the employee access grant in ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.
